fullStackSenior.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
fullStackSenior.description:
We are seeking a Senior Full-Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience to join our engineering team.

Required Skills:
- React.js and modern JavaScript (ES6+)
- Node.js and Express.js
- MongoDB or PostgreSQL
- RESTful API design and implementation
- Git and version control
- Docker and containerization
- AWS or Azure cloud services
- Microservices architecture
- CI/CD pipelines
- TypeScript

Responsibilities:
- Design and build scalable web applications
- Architect backend APIs and database schemas
- Optimize application performance and database queries
- Deploy applications to cloud infrastructure
- Write unit and integration tests
- Mentor junior developers
- Participate in code reviews
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams

Nice to Have:
- GraphQL experience
- Kubernetes knowledge
- Redis caching
- WebSocket/real-time features
- Agile/Scrum experience

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 5+ years of professional software development experience
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication abilities

frontendReact.title: React Frontend Developer
frontendReact.description:
We're looking for a talented React Developer to create beautiful, responsive user interfaces.

Required Skills:
- 3+ years of React.js experience
- JavaScript/TypeScript proficiency
- HTML5 and CSS3
- Tailwind CSS or Material-UI
- Responsive design principles
- Webpack or Vite
- Git version control
- RESTful API integration

Responsibilities:
- Build reusable React components
- Implement responsive designs from Figma mockups
- Optimize web performance (Lighthouse scores 90+)
- Ensure cross-browser compatibility
- Write clean, maintainable code
- Collaborate with UX/UI designers
- Participate in code reviews

Nice to Have:
- Vue.js or Angular experience
- Next.js knowledge
- Accessibility (WCAG) expertise
- Animation libraries (Framer Motion, GSAP)
- Testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress)
- State management (Redux, Zustand)

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Design, or related field
- Strong portfolio showcasing React projects
- Eye for design and attention to detail

backendNodeJs.title: Backend Node.js Engineer
backendNodeJs.description:
Join our backend team to build robust APIs and microservices serving millions of users.

Required Skills:
- 4+ years of Node.js development experience
- Express.js or Fastify framework
- PostgreSQL and/or MongoDB
- RESTful and GraphQL API design
- Docker containerization
- AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda)
- Redis or Memcached
- Message queues (RabbitMQ, Kafka)
- Microservices architecture
- Git and CI/CD pipelines

Responsibilities:
- Design and develop scalable backend services
- Build and maintain RESTful and GraphQL APIs
- Optimize database queries and schema design
- Implement caching strategies
- Deploy services using Docker and Kubernetes
- Monitor application performance and troubleshoot issues
- Write comprehensive tests (unit, integration, e2e)
- Document APIs and systems

Nice to Have:
- Python or Go experience
- Elasticsearch knowledge
- Event-driven architecture
- Serverless (AWS Lambda)
- Prometheus/Grafana monitoring
- Security best practices

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science
- Strong understanding of data structures and algorithms
- Experience with high-traffic applications

mlEngineer.title: Machine Learning Engineer
mlEngineer.description:
We're seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to develop and deploy ML models in production.

Required Skills:
- Python programming (3+ years)
- Machine Learning algorithms and techniques
- TensorFlow or PyTorch
- scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy
- SQL and NoSQL databases
- Docker and containerization
- Cloud platforms (AWS SageMaker, GCP AI Platform)
- MLOps and model deployment
- Git version control

Responsibilities:
- Develop machine learning models for various use cases
- Train, evaluate, and optimize ML algorithms
- Deploy models to production environments
- Build data pipelines for model training
- Monitor model performance and retrain as needed
- Collaborate with data scientists and engineers
- Implement A/B testing for model improvements
- Document model architecture and findings

Nice to Have:
- Deep Learning experience (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers)
- NLP or Computer Vision expertise
- Spark or big data technologies
- R programming
- Kubernetes
- Feature engineering expertise
- Research publications

Qualifications:
- Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
- 3+ years of ML engineering experience
- Strong mathematical and statistical background

dataScientist.title: Data Scientist
dataScientist.description:
Looking for a Data Scientist to uncover insights from data and build predictive models.

Required Skills:
- Python (Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn)
- SQL (complex queries, optimization)
- Statistical analysis and hypothesis testing
- Machine Learning algorithms
- Data visualization (Matplotlib, Seaborn, Tableau)
- A/B testing and experimentation
- Jupyter Notebooks
- Git version control

Responsibilities:
- Analyze large datasets to identify trends and patterns
- Build predictive models and recommendation systems
- Perform statistical analysis and hypothesis testing
- Create data visualizations and dashboards
- Conduct A/B tests to measure impact
- Collaborate with product and engineering teams
- Present findings to stakeholders
- Document methodologies and results

Nice to Have:
- R programming
- Deep Learning (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
- Big Data tools (Spark, Hadoop)
- Cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
- NLP or time series analysis
- Power BI or Looker
- Causal inference methods

Qualifications:
- Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
- 3+ years of data science experience
- Strong communication skills

juniorFullStack.title: Junior Full-Stack Developer
juniorFullStack.description:
Great opportunity for recent graduates or early-career developers to grow their skills.

Required Skills:
- JavaScript fundamentals
- HTML5 and CSS3
- React.js basics
- Node.js and Express.js
- MySQL or MongoDB
- Git version control
- RESTful API concepts

Responsibilities:
- Develop web applications under senior guidance
- Write clean, maintainable code
- Fix bugs and implement features
- Participate in code reviews
- Learn and apply best practices
- Collaborate with team members
- Attend daily standups and sprint meetings

Nice to Have:
- TypeScript knowledge
- Any frontend framework experience
- Testing experience (Jest, Mocha)
- Docker basics
- Agile methodology understanding
- Personal projects or portfolio

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 0-2 years of professional experience
- Strong willingness to learn
- Good communication skills

devOpsMismatch.title: DevOps Engineer
devOpsMismatch.description:
Looking for an experienced DevOps Engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure.

Required Skills:
- Kubernetes administration
- Terraform and Infrastructure as Code
- AWS services (EKS, EC2, S3, RDS, CloudFormation)
- CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
- Docker containerization
- Linux system administration
- Bash/Python scripting
- Monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack)
- Networking and security

Responsibilities:
- Manage Kubernetes clusters in production
- Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
- Write Infrastructure as Code using Terraform
- Monitor system performance and reliability
- Implement security best practices
- Automate deployment processes
- Troubleshoot production issues
- Optimize infrastructure costs

Nice to Have:
- AWS certification
- Helm charts
- ArgoCD or Flux
- Service mesh (Istio, Linkerd)
- Ansible or Chef

Qualifications:
- 4+ years of DevOps experience
- Strong Linux background
- Problem-solving mindset
